forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
